game.name: Aliens Clash
game.desc: 2 Alien races have clashed for years, the winner will be decided by the champion of each race Play as the champion of a race. Travel and shoot your way through different worlds and levels. Win your race and defeat the other champion!

game.name: Armored Warriors Cyberbots
game.desc: In the year 2281, the United Earth Government and the Principalities of Raia signed a ceasefire treaty, ending a war that lasted for half a century. One year after the signing of the treaty, the United Earth Government's 18th scouting party reported that the Raian capital, Melkide, has been captured by an army of unknown origin. The United Earth Government decided to dispatch an army to Raia to retake the capital and rescue its citizens. However, unbeknownst to the general public, the true purpose of this operation was to eliminate the unknown enemy and bring Raia under Earth's control.

game.name: Art Of Fighting -bor Remix 3
game.desc:
This is based off of the original fighting game Art of Fighting that comes to a Beat Em Up tradition.
Ryo Sakazaki hears that his father, Takuma, is killed (supposedly), and missing. Even his sister, Yuri, is kidnapped. So he contacts Robert Garcia and talked to him about it.

game.name: Art of Fighting : Trouble in South Town
game.desc: - The game is similiar to final fight or streets of rage series. - It contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels... - It uses edited characters from King of Fighters and other arcade games. - It has several animated gifs/movies that will show at the end of each boss/ sequence of levels that will take you throw the story. - Approximately 15/20 hours of gameplay if you play very fast. - And much more.

game.name: Asterix And Caesars Challenge
game.desc: You accompany Asterix and Obelix in their adventures. The game is set up like the old school Batman Returns or King of Dragons. You have an energy bar and use it to perform 2 different attacks and beat the Roman army. You should not forget to jump occasionally as it is helps you to progress in the game.

game.name: Tale Of Vengeance, A
game.desc: This game tells a story about five warriors, having their own vengeance on their loved ones against each of their nemeses. Their own nemeses await upon them to fight. All five warriors meet together and team up for vengeance.

game.name: Bad Ass Babes
game.desc:
Bad ass babes is a video game using live action sprites and features a cheesy, B grade plot and over the top sexy moves.
PLOT: Earth has been invaded by an alien race. Men are being captured and turned into mutant soldiers whilst the women are being herded like cattle to be used for the alien breeding program. To survive the mutiple births and to ensure the hybrid experiments are a success the aliens endow the women with special strength and power. A few of these women are rising up against the invasion and plan to take on the aliens and anyone else in their way

game.name: Balance Of Power
game.desc: Balance of Power is an intense beat'em up, with a high degree of special effects and an eclectic cast of characters. It has no story, and the game simply invites the player to deal blows and deploy spectacular attacks to destroy the hordes of enemies that will come out. The combat system includes the possibility of combos and special attacks, making the player's skill necessary at certain times to combine it well. The game has 15 phases, 3 game modes, 1 secret character, characters from many Sega, SNK, Capcom or Konami games, confrontations against legions of zombies, soldiers, ninjas, vampires and many other forces of evil that will make things difficult for us .

game.name: Bare Knuckle Vacuum
game.desc: This Bare Knuckle Vacuum is based on the Streets of Rage series, it was designed by Volcanic and can be played by 4 players. You have 3 levels of difficulty (easy, normal, hard), or you can play with several characters from the saga including the classics Axel, Blaze, Adam and Shiva ... There are several evolutions released after this version 1.0 that will have improved the game system.

game.name: Bare Knuckle 6
game.desc: Bare Knuckle VI is a Chinese fangame designed by Anking and Volcanic, released in 2012. The movements and physics of the game are based on those of the previous title Bare Knuckle Vacuum (although with some modifications), it is designed as a sequel to this game - hence the numbering system (V=Vacuum, VI = this sequel). There are six playable characters: Axel "Hawk" Stone, Blaze Fielding, Max Thunder, Adam Hunter, Dr. Gilbert Zan and an unlockable character, Shiva. The story is entirely written in Chinese; each playable character has special moves and super moves; you can also use weapons in this game.

game.name: Batman Gotham Knights
game.desc: Batman Gotham Knights is Beat'em'all game. Play as Batman, Robin or Batgirl. Face your enemies who will never stop to fight you. Will you manage to reach the Big Boss who controls them all and bring back the peace to Gotham?

game.name: Battletoads Double Dragon - The Revenge
game.desc: this game contains these features : - Choose from 5 playable characters: Rash - Zitz - Pimple - Billy - Jimmy - Play solo and save Marian alone or play simultaneously for classic 2 player co-op action - Follow the story as you go through 8 missions - 3 vehicle stages to crank up the action - 4 extra bonus modes selectable from the start - Detailed old-school cutscenes between missions - Lots of different moves to crush your enemies with - Familiair enemies and bosses from both the Battletoads and Double Dragon series - Soundtrack consisting of songs from various Battletoads and Double Dragon games And many other features...

game.name: Battletoads Double Dragon - The T.bird Mission
game.desc:
This is a new part of a famous crossover with the participation of characters from the game series Battletoads and Double Dragon!
Three human-like toads, Rash, Zitz, Pimple and dragon brothers Billy and Jimmy Lee must save professor T. Bird in their new adventures. He is a teacher and a master of the toads, who was kidnapped by the Queen of Dark, who rules Ragnarok planet. It is going to be a really serious battle, toads and dragons will have to fight against numerous enemies and bosses, which are sent by the Queen of Dark. Moreover, evil Queen called Shadow Boss to help her, they act as one team. Choose one of three toads or one of two dragons and conquer the space with the help of your fists! There are 9 different missions in this game, each of them is divided into several parts.

game.name: Battle Toads
game.desc: The game took eight long months to create, contains five completely different game modes, and four playable characters: Rash, Pimple & Zitz from Battletoads and Sketch Turner from Comix Zone.

game.name: Battle Arena Toshinden Origin
game.desc: Beat'em all based on the world of Toshinden (PlayStation). The game is very nervous with a lot of enemies.

game.name: Beast And Blanka In The Violent World
Beats Of Rage Alliance Super Sayan
Beats Of Rage Original
game.desc:
Beats of Rage is a customisable video game engine made by Senile Team and inspired by Sega's classic Streets of Rage series. With Beats of Rage, users can create their own beat 'em up games - no programming experience required!
Beats of Rage was first released for DOS in November 2003. It was not advertised in any way other than by word of mouth, yet it soon gained enormous popularity. Ports to many other systems (e.g. Dreamcast, Linux, Windows, GP32, GP2X, etc) soon followed.

game.name: Beats Of Rage Xtra
game.desc: A new version of Beats of Rage with 4 additional characters: Rock, Mai, Terry / Bogard, Evy / Vanessa

game.name: Bruce Lee - Revenge Of The Dragon
game.desc: There's no better inspiration for a beat'em up than the master of kung-fu himself – Bruce Lee. He's the main protagonist of Bruce Lee : Revenge of the Dragon, a side-scrolling action game similar to games such as Final Fight : Gold or Double Dragon III : The Dragon Stone. The story tells us that Bruce rises from the dead and will go out for revenge on Dim Mak, fighting through the streets of Tokyo and Hong Kong. The narrative is reinforced by some static screens. Gameplay is great and although the graphics aren't perfect, they're very serviceable. Fans of martial arts movies and of Bruce Lee himself are advised to try this game.

game.name: Captain Commando And The Avengers
game.desc:
Captain Commando and The Avengers is a Beats of Rage mod created by Gabo-Hanzo which features the superhero from Capcom fighting alongside the Marvel characters.
NOTE: Check 'How To Play' in the game menu for further instructions with the extra character moves available with this BoR mod.

game.name: Castlevania Lcd Chronicles
game.desc: Castlevania LCD Chronicles was an original game for Window version based from the LCD handheld game. The original version of Simon's Quest and Symphony of The Night was remade by Ericard Productions, along with the remake of Sprite to develop games that use LavaLit software programs. Castlevania Dracula X is the original games that was added in as the main sequence of Castlevania LCD Chronicles.

game.name: Castlevania Lcd Chronicles
game.desc: Castlevania LCD Chronicles was an original game for Window version based from the LCD handheld game. The original version of Simon's Quest and Symphony of The Night was remade by Ericard Productions, along with the remake of Sprite to develop games that use LavaLit software programs. Castlevania Dracula X is the original games that was added in as the main sequence of Castlevania LCD Chronicles.

game.name: Castlevania Legacy Of Dracula
game.desc: In this Beat'Em-Up game, play as one of the five legendary characters from the Castlevania saga. Choose between Alucard, Trevor Belmont, Simon Belmont, Ritcher Belmont or Jonathan Morris. Jump and fight a bunch of ennemies.

game.name: City Of Heroes
game.desc: In City of Heroes, play as a superhero and fight the bad guys. Sometimes the DC comics universe, sometimes from the Marvel universe, choose between around twenty crime fighters and let justice prevail!

game.name: Clafan - Classic Fantasy
game.desc: Retro-styled, semi-open world, RPG beat 'em up hybrid! Choose a character, and go on an adventure! Up to 4 players.

game.name: Contra - Locked N Loaded
game.desc:
This mod is an attempt to remake Contra, one of top classic games, with OpenBoR. It's not 100% remade but at least basic and important gameplay is remade
Modes: 3 missions, 1 locked mission & 1 locked boss rush mode
Soldiers : Bill Rizer, Brad Fang, Probotector, Sheena Etranzi, Mad Dog, Bahamut & Lucia
Abilities: - Shoot in 8 direction - Slide (no invincibility though) - Platform drop (disabled in some levels) - Free and fixed shooting mode - Carry 2 weapons but only use one everytime
Disabilities: - Unable to climb walls - Unable to hang to railing - Unable to fire 2 weapons at same time
Features: - 12 different weapons - Health bar which gives 3 hit points for player - Health item to restore health - Motorbike mode - Plenty pseudo travel levels both horizontal and vertical - Challenging bosses and subbosses - Save game is enabled for all missions but Boss Rush
This mod uses 4 buttons, don't forget to define key for each!
Bahamut has similar ability as the other soldiers for balance. His sprites are made by slash128

game.name: Crime Buster
game.desc:
You will meet well known characters – beautiful Kula and big Max, who devoted their lives to struggle against evil in the city streets. Only that this time the team is not in full force. You will not see Mandy in this game anymore, but you will meet three new characters: Asians Bao and Athena and American Ralph. It is also worth mentioning that the playing process has many new elements, it is now longer and more difficult. The atmosphere of the game is the same.
You will have to destroy several street gangs of the city, which sell drugs. Be careful, you might be killed if you have several bucks in your pocket. Go ahead, go into cruel battles and street fights.

game.name: Double Dragon 4
game.desc: After the defeat of the Black Warriors in Double Dragon II: The Revenge (1988), Billy and Jimmy Lee look to spread their Sosetsuken martial art by establishing dojos around the country. However, they soon face a new threat in a gang called the Renegades.

game.name: Double Dragon Extreme
game.desc:
This mod is a fantastic piece of work that feature remakes of the arcade version of Double Dragon 1 and 2 and the NES version of Double Dragon 2.
The game features three fighting styles and its a matter of opinion on which one is the best suited for you.

game.name: Double Dragon Gold
game.desc: Double Dragon Gold is one of the oldest OpenBoR games from Pierwolf. You can play with four players, the game has 3 chapters and a training mode. The game has good gameplay, pixelated 16-bit style graphics, several classic enemies and new challenges. The difficulty is simple in a good part of the game, except the final bosses which are more complicated to beat ...

game.name: Double Dragon 3 - The Dragon Stone
game.desc: An enjoyable game developed by gabo hanzo , this open bor game is full of special moves that make the old double dragon 3 a decent game to have fun! So what add this remake to the old technos saga? 3 characters gameplay lots of new skills rearranged graphics from the past double dragon games arranged music

game.name: Dragon Ball Z - Attack Of The Saiyans
Dragon Ball Z Tournament
game.desc: It's a game released on April 30, 2017 that sees players compete in a one-on-one tournament. Set in an alternate timeline / universe, this game focuses on the perpetual battle of enemies trying to take over the land and get the crystal balls (Dragon Balls in English). In order to put an end to the constant threats on the earth a tournament is organized, the losers can no longer attack the earth or claim the crystal balls. DBZ Tournament has a unique system where players can move up and down the stage, some special moves generate cut scenes with animations directly from DBZ anime. The combat is inspired by the series and requires players to dodge and maneuver around the screen while strategically charging their Ki energy and planning their attacks. Players are able to charge their Ki energy and transform in the middle of battle and unleash projectiles and special moves, some stages contain destructible environments with certain items containing health elements for recovery.

game.name: Elfen Lied
game.desc:
Elfen Lied is a Beats of Rage mod created by Kelvinblue and is based on the Japanese Manga series created by Lynn Okamoto.
WARNING: This game contains animated nudity.

game.name: Eternal Champions - The Thin Strings Of Fate
Evil Dead
game.desc: Play as Ash from Evil Dead. Edit based on Pizzaman's Evil Splatter mod. First mod created by nsw25.

game.name: Fatal Fury Final
game.desc: According to SEEP, Fatal Fury Final is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style. The detail including the characters are developed as close as possible to the Neo Geo but twists it up as you can play as the heroes or as the bosses. Also included is your own path such as South Town Quest or the original The King of Fighters Tournament.

game.name: Fatal Fury Re Bout
game.desc: Fatal Fury Final: Re-Bout is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style.All retro neo geo look in one cool fan made game. You can play as heroes or as bosses, choose your path in the South Town Quest mode or play a the original The King of Fighters tournament.

game.name: Final Fight And Cadillacs Ver.1.0
game.desc: This game was created by Pablo M. Vera and is a crossover of Capcom's two most nostalgic beat'em up games: Final Fight and Cadillacs & Dinosaurs. There are seven playable characters: three from Final Fight (Guy, Cody and Haggar) and three from C&D (Mess, Jack and Mustapha), note that the character of Haggar has two versions: an FF1 and one from SlamMasters. One of the reasons Hannah is not playable here is that, like Jessica, she must be saved.

game.name: Final Fight Apocalypse - 2nd Edition
game.desc: 4 playable characters - Haggar, Cody, Guy and Scorp (from Saturday Nite Slam Masters) 4-player simultaneous gameplay Tons of special moves for each character, as well as useable weapons (uncommon for most BOR mods) Challenging enemies who block, teleport and won't hesitate to throw you around!

game.name: Final Fight Vs King Of Fighters
Fire Emblem Castle Defense
game.desc: An action tower defense game; the very first of its kind on OpenBOR! 11 characters to choose from, 2 game modes, 2 unlockable modes, and lots of fun.

game.name: G.i. Joe
game.desc:
Fight on foot and in vehicles as you battle your way over land, under sea and in the air to the depths of Cobra Island, in attempt to stop a doomsday missile from being launched before it's too late!
Beat Story Mode to unlock more missions!

game.name: Godzilla - Ultraman - Gamera! All Out Monster War!
game.desc:
A four-player giant monster classic arcade beat em up (quite the mouthful, I know) starring japan's three greatest giant monstars- Godzilla! Ultraman! and Gamera! 11 Characters in total (plus 7 bonus) with 17 levels and a boss rush mode to top it off. Currently a work in progress.
PLAYABLE CHARACTERS: Godzilla (1975) Ultraman Gamera King Kong Rodan Ultraman Tiga Mothra Kiryu Ultraseven Gomora Anguirus
UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS: Godzilla (1954) Godzilla (1965) Godzilla (1991) Gigan Biollante Megalon Megaguirus Orga

game.name: Golden Axe Genesis
game.desc:
This release is a tribute to the Golden Axe series of games released for the Sega Mega Drive, which was known as the Sega Genesis in America.
Features -13 different playable characters -4 hidden characters -3 game modes (Story, Original and The Duel) -Story Mode with multiple routes -A total of 21 stages -The Duel with 20 missions and 15 exclusive arenas -More than 20 different enemies -Three beasts to ride -Exclusive features for each character -1 to 4 players simultaneously -Original Soundtrack

game.name: Golden Axe Legend
game.desc: In olden times, the majestic gods which governed the earth did use the battle axe called "Golden Axe" to banish evil giants. At length, a new generation was come. Humans appeared above the earth and were inherited that battle axe. The departed gods left a final message: "The Axe must bring justice and peace and not be used to unleash dark-rooted evil and destruction..." But one day, a mysterious death lord suddenly appeared. Allied with an evil entity, he stole the Golden Axe. With his entire demon army, he overran the kingdom of Splash Hill, in mid-Eastland, imprisoned and enslaved the people. It was soon quite clear to Gilius Thunderaxe, a member of the long living Dwarf race, that the axe must be retrieved by any means necessary. Gilius sought brave warriors to save the people from this crisis. Before long, there were 6 heroes standing before him.

game.name: Guardian Heroes - Warpath
game.desc: This game, created by BurnKing, features eight playable characters inspired by the Guardian Heroes series. You will face multiple enemies and will be able to choose different paths, which open multiple endings, and thus a long life span to finish the game completely. Along the way you will also be able to ride the animals! When mapping the buttons, pay attention to the settings of your attack buttons that will allow you to make combos.

game.name: Guilty Gear The Crusades
game.desc: A decent OpenBOR game that's based on Guilty Gear. The graphics are a bit on the mediocre side, since the GG characters are missing frames of animation, the enemies are "familiar", and the game has the default physics, but if you can get past these aspects it's alright. Playable characters: Sol Badguy, Ky Kiske, Potemkin, Baiken, Hayato (Star Gladiator), Ceil (Melty Blood)

game.name: Halloween - The Wrath Of Michael Myers
Hyper Final Fight
game.desc: An excellent mod featuring all the nice graphics, sounds and characters from Final Fight.

game.name: Hyper Final Fight 2
game.desc: 1 single story + boss rush. A mod technically superior to HFF1! - 6 playable characters: Haggar, Cody, Guy, Lucia, Carlos and DeeJay! - New and deadly enemies and bosses! - 7 challenging stages, bringing new stuff to BoR experience! - EX Boss Rush mode (finish the game to unlock!) - New cinemas!

game.name: Ikari Warriors 2010
game.desc: Ikari Warriors 2010 is the spiritual successor of POW 2010. Like POW 2010, Ikari Warriors 2010 have a look ispirated from The King of Fighters series and a solid combat batle system. This is a fan made spin off of the original SNK saga created with OpenBOR engine, allow choose three heroes and fight in a classic arcade beat em up way.

game.name: Joe And Mac - Caveman Ninja
game.desc: Joe and Mac: Caveman Ninja is a BoR mod created by Belavi as a tribute to the classic Joe and Mac video game series. The mod manages to capture the original Joe and Mac atmosphere and keeps the entertainment value with its characters and animations.

game.name: Justice League United
game.desc: Play as one of 14 members of the Justice League in this Beat'Em-Up. Each hero has special powers. Battle a horde of enemies on land, under the sea or in the air. Will you be able to defeat one of the most powerful enemies in the DC Comics universe? No one but Darkseid himself...

game.name: Kill Bill Vol 1
game.desc: Kill Bill Volume 1 is a Beats of Rage mod created by Demitri and is based on the characters from the action thriller film of the same name created by Quentin Tarantino in 2003.

game.name: Kill Ryu 1
game.desc: Kill Ryu Volume 1 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine as a parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.

game.name: Kill Ryu 2
game.desc: Kill Ryu Volume 2 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine, it is a continuation with the parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod picks up where Kill Ryu Volume 1 left off, it also features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.

game.name: Lift
game.desc: Save skyscrapers from evil robots group called Falcor! Play as Light Intelligent Falcor Terminator and terminatennFalcor for good!

game.name: Marvel - First Alliance 2
game.desc:
Sequel of Marvel First Alliance game, Marvel First Alliance 2 is a beat 'em up where you can choose between tons of famous characters from the Marvel universe to lead a fight against the forces of evil led by Red Skull, who is trying to take over the world.
Marvel First Alliance 2 has four different playing modes. In all, you can visit eight different zones divided into more than twenty levels packed full of enemies, including some special bosses.

game.name: Marvel - Infinity War
game.desc:
Adam Warlock warns the earth of the Infinity Stones being sought by Magus, and so earth's heroes divide into teams to collect each Gem. These gems are placed into the possession of The Enchantress, MODOK, Selene, Ronan the Accuser, and Russia's superheroes.
In the end, the gathering of the heroes is what allows Magus to collect them all and try to wipe the floor with them.
Marvel Infinity War is a module created by ZVitor, based on the Marvel Comics Universe, and is a sequel to the Marvel First Alliance series. The game has 74 (soon to be 80+) playable characters plus one secret character. There are also over 36 bosses to contend with. The game uses a six-button control scheme. Each character has at least one special move and an ultra move. There are also many special assist characters to summon.

game.name: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns
game.desc: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns features the Spider-Man, Venom and Deadpool characters as well as various ninemics from the classic Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage, originally released in 1994 for Super Nintendo and Mega Drive / SEGA Genesis.

game.name: Megaman - War Of The Past
game.desc: Megaman: War Of The Past has the unique distinction of being the first fully completed Beats of Rage mod. Created by DCSteve in 2004, the mod displayed many features which would lead the way for even more enhancements to the original game module. The mod also influenced the further development of the Beats of Rage game engine, which eventually became OpenBoR.

game.name: Mega Sonic
game.desc: A storm has arrived throughout the land. Two of the most diabolical scientists have joined forces and are spreading terror all over the planet. Dr. Robotnik and Dr. Wily are taking no prisoners and have created an army of robots. With Wily's help, Robotnik can improve his creations and even rebuild his ultimate weapon, "The Death Egg". There are even two new robots that Wily and Robotnik designed together. The only ones who stand in their way are Sonic, Mega Man, Knuckles, Proto Man, Bass, Shadow, Tails, Bunnie, Roll and Rouge. Get ready for the greatest battle throughout Mega Man and Sonic history and the first time ever that these two worlds collide.

game.name: Metal Slug Beat'em Up
game.desc: Metal Slug reimagined as a side scrolling beat'em up.

game.name: Monster Girl Dimensions
game.desc: The witch Lucifer betrayed Beatrice, after she passed her mystical progeny to Eva Beatrice, someone Lucifer thought was unworthy! Lucifer, now has the gems that have the power to open parallel dimensions. One of Lucifer's magic students is sent on a mission, but through interference from Beatrice and her followers, something goes wrong. Now the disciple of Lucifer, is lost in an unknown dimension full of monster girls, and needs to figure out some way to get back to his reality. Meanwhile, Lucifer continues to fight alone against Beatrice's side.

game.name: Mortal Kombat - The Chosen One
game.desc: The history : The idea of the story is that the Elder gods, on earth prophecy that a young woman in her tenth birthday will become the Chosen One, the only hope to defeat an ancient demon who seeks to invoke Shao Kahn. For this task an alliance of different realms is formed to find the Chosen One before Shao Khan, and give the medallion that starts prophecy awakening in the Chosen One extraordinary powers. Along with the Chosen, a few heroes embark on the crusade to stop Shao Kahn and their armies, before the ancient evil awakens. Game/demo v0.4.7 : 12 characters selectable from the beginning (Carolina, Liu Kang, Raiden: Kitana, Tusk, Jago, Fulgore, Orchid, Midas, Batman, Robocop and The Chosen One (Carolina's version, after taking the amulet of the elements)) ; 8 Missions composed of 44 levels ; Multiple paths, which will affect the course of the adventure ; Each mission has a Bonus Stage at the end ; 4 fatalities per hero, in addition to No Mercy ; Weapons, Knives, Bats with nails, with which you can execute the enemy ; New Stage Fatalities ; New bosses ; New look for the old enemies ; New "Combo Breaker" system ; Killer Instinct Style Announcer ; And a lot lot more...

game.name: Mortal Kombat Outworld Assassins
game.desc: Play as one of the three famous ninja among Scorpion, Sub-Zero or Noob Saibot of the Mortal Kombat franchise in this Beat'Em-Up created for Openbor. Fight your way by facing a multitude of enemies including the best known of the MK universe. Can you defeat the dreaded Quan Chi?

game.name: Mortal Kombat Unlimited
game.desc: Play as one of the famous characters of the Mortal Kombat franchise in Beat'Em-Up create for Openbor. Choose between Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, Kitana, Kung-Lao, John Cage, Liu Kang or Jax. Fight your way by facing a multitude of enemies. Can you defeat the dreaded Shaokahn?

game.name: Neon Lightning Force
game.desc:
The year is 2044. After the events of world war 3, the United States and European Union are no more, so utterly devastated they were by the nuclear fallout. the power vacuum in northern America gave rise to the "Pacific Union", with Neopolis as it's capital in South America.
While the world is still at peace, the Neopolis police still fights the crimes in it's city, even as they are getting more violent by the day.
They send a special agent, Isolde Shinwara, to investigate those cases finding traces of drako, a drug that makes a person stronger and aggressive. As follows the case, she will find it leads to a much more dangerous, and corrupt, path that was originally thought...

game.name: Night Slashers X
game.desc: At the base, the game Night Slashers was released on arcade in 1994. It is a game of horror atmosphere from Data East. During the course of the game, the player must beat hordes of attacking zombies and mutants, as well as other enemies, such as wolves or elementals. Bosses are also stereotype monsters, like mummies, golems, and look-alikes of Count Dracula and Frankenstein's monster. Choose to play as Christopher, Jake or Jasmine.

game.name: Rainbow
game.desc:
Fly your way through shape based dungeons and shoot colored shapes with same colored beam. Correct beam will destroy them while wrong one will have side effect depending on the shape. Avoid the shapes, get powerups and survive! Can you destroy the shapes and survive 5 stages in this challenging colorful adventure?
Version1 was made for Shoot'em up Jam. Version 2 is the post jam and updated version

game.name: Rescue Command - Ep II Attack on Amazon Island
Rescue Command Arrange - Ep 1 - Escaping from Bad Girls Island 2
Rescue Command Arrange - Ep 1 - Escaping from Bad Girls Island 2
Retro Gamer Adventure
game.desc:
Retro Gamers are under so much hate on youtube, so this friends must travel to video-game world and deal with all haters punching they face,nnon this world each char can use a cosplay from your favorite character.
Texts and Audios in Portuguese

game.name: Return Of The Double Dragon
game.desc:
Return of Double Dragon is a Beats of Rage Mod tribute to the Technos Japan series of beat 'em up games that originated back in 1987. The original Double Dragon games spanned over some classic consoles including the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), Sega Master System (SMS), Atari 2600, Nintendo Game Boy, Sega Genesis / Mega Drive and Atari Lynx.
"This really is a must-have; even for people who never played Double Dragon before. It features the original plot that this game was supposed to have, but sadly got cut into the versions we all know..." - Mr.Q

game.name: Rhythm Of Destruction 2 - Street Fighter Edition
game.desc:
Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters.
Street Fighter Version - Featuring SF Remixes (KH & Q) Ryu Ken Guile Dhalsim Chun Li Yun

game.name: Rocket Viper 2
game.desc: Rocket Viper is a both Beat 'Em Up and fighting styles homebrew series game, mainly based on KoF (The King of Fighters), Street Fighter and A Tale Of Vengeance (another famous mod game with OpenBOR). Developed using OpenBOR, made by fan player Volcanic from China. Similar to Beats of Rage, but more superb and interesting.

game.name: Rocket Viper 2
game.desc: Rocket Viper is a both Beat 'Em Up and fighting styles homebrew series game, mainly based on KoF (The King of Fighters), Street Fighter and A Tale Of Vengeance (another famous mod game with OpenBOR). Developed using OpenBOR, made by fan player Volcanic from China. Similar to Beats of Rage, but more superb and interesting.

game.name: Sailor Moon Alternate Story - Clone Attack
Sailor Moon Alternate Story - Clone Attack
Sega Brawlers Mega Mix
game.desc:
SEGA Brawlers Megamix is an awesome fan made retro side-scrolling beat-em-up that features a roster of about 74 characters from SEGA classics like Sonic, Toejam & Earl, Streets of Rage, Golden Axe, Guardian Heroes, Comix Zone, Shinobi, Vector Man, Ristar, and other multiplatform games like Earthworm Jim, Battletoads and Splatterhouse.
It's a wonderful love letter to SEGA's 16-Bit heyday and a remarkably fun 4 player beat-em-up. The amount of work that's gone into the game is incredible, all the characters have their own move sets and special moves, the soundtrack is fantastic and all the levels and enemies are based on classics, such as Streets of Rage, Golden Axe and Sonic. There's even a Vs Battle mode, as well as various unlockable gameplay modes and characters unlocked by completing the main adventure.
The game's still in development, and could do with a little more variety in the main adventure mode and some bigger bosses, but the massive character roster certainly makes up for these minor shortfalls. It's a fantastic homage to SEGA, 16-bit gaming and classic side-scrolling arcade beat-em-ups. Remarkably, the dev (DJGameFreakTheIguana) is still planning to add even more characters to the game. There really can't be many more 16-bit SEGA characters out there ? Ecco the Dolphin maybe?
-Set controls for Attacks 1,2,3, & 4, all of them are used. Attack 1 is used for combo attacks, some characters have only 1 strike to knuck enemies away. Attacks 2 3 & 4 are used to perform different special moves. Some characters can use more moves by pressing one of the button while moving.
-Special is a strong move most characters use to blast many enemies away in different ways. Some do combos, shoot power shots, effect much of the screen, or blast through the stage blasting anyone in their way. Some of them(Mainly the Steets of Rage fighters) have a second special that can be used while holding left or right.
-Most characters are able to grab enemies by walking into them. You can pummel by pressing attack, perform different finishers by pressing attack while holding up or down, and can throw or perform a different attack while pressing your controls behind you(If you grab while facing right, hold left on your key/contoller)
-In battle mode, there are 2 different stages. 3D stages allow you to move in all diresctions(Like steets of Rage), but on 2D stages, you can only move left or right(Like Sonic
-in 2D stages, you can perform moves to jump up platforms too high to reach with a normal jump by holding down and pressing the jump key, or jump down the platform by holding down and pressing attack. Most characters can attack during these jumps, so watch for enemies over or under you
-There are only 3 modes to play, Adventure, Arcade, and Battle. Beating adventure mode will unlock the other modes. Most of them are the same except Aliiance mode and Mission mode. In all of these locked modes, you can play as the secret characters. They will still show up as ? marks on the screen, but keep going through the characters as you would and they will appear.

game.name: Simpsons Treehouse Of Horror
game.desc:
Paying homage to the classic arcade game. This story revolves around an Alien Invasion trying to take over earth. Homer, Bart and Krusty work there way through the Aliens as they unleash all sorts of enemies and even teleport characters from other times and dimensions to assist them.
Features of the game. Loads of exciting levels and environments, characters and bosses (including characters not just from Simpsons lore but also Futurama and Family Guy cameos) mini game set in a makeshift kwik e mart where you can get bonus lives. vehicle levels Big boss battles NPCs who can assist you weapons
Includes Bonus games ! Reclaim Burns Manor: Where you are Vampire Mr Burns and you must stop criminals from looting your mansion Tournament mode: Where you must face enemies in one on one combat Family Guy: where you are Peter and see the events that unfold before he and his family are teleported to Springfield Gallery mode: special images for your viewing pleasure

game.name: Sonic Revolution
game.desc:
Sonic Adventure: Revolution is a beat'em up game with characters not just from the games, but other canons too, like the Freedom Fighters, and Sonic's siblings from Underground.
Once you choose a character, you're taken to a map where you can choose any stage and getting to fighting robots. There's 3D gameplay where you move in all directions, 2D where you only move left to right and can jump up platforms and back down by holding down and pressing attack, also hitting enemies under you. There are also mach speed sections, derived from Sonic 06 where you fight while contentiously running at high speed, and the new flight sections exclusive to Campaign 2, same as mach speed, but on extreme gear.

game.name: Street Of Rage 2x
game.desc: An epic Streets of Rage mod! - 4 players at the same time - New "Air combo" system (with juggle control) - New "Hit" and "Max Hit" counter - New "Rage" special skill - New "Special" and "Guard" bars - New "Block" and "Guard break" ability - Random regular enemy "Spawn" - Random "Dropped itens" from obstacles - Improved enemy A.I. and skills - All "Enemies" and "Bosses" are playable - Some improved graphic effects - And constantly updated with bug corrections and new content

game.name: Street Of Rage Xxx
game.desc: Streets of Rage XXX (pronounced "Triplex") is an SOR fangame originally created by Allan Cylakes and Alpha152 in 2007. It's one of the oldest Streets of Rage fangames. There are many playable characters: Axel, Adam, Blaze, Skate (aka Sammy), Max, Dr. Zan, Roo (aka Victy) and Shiva, and two guest characters: Dee Jay from the Street Fighter series and Kevin Ryan from Garou: Mark of the Wolves (here called Allan). Mr. X and the Syndicate are back (again!), and it's up to our heroes to put an end to their latest project. With 10 levels and five different story modes (Director's Cut A, B, C, D and E), Streets of Rage XXX will give you and your friends a fighting experience you'll want to come back to again and again!

game.name: Streets of Rage Z 2
game.desc: Streets of Rage Z is chinese fan made OpenBoR mod based on Streets of Rage Trilogy.

game.name: Streets of Rage Z 3
game.desc: Z3 is an optimized version of Z2, adding two new players, adding hidden special skills and other level branches. New characters are Yuri Sakazaki and Ralf Jones all from the franchise The King of Fighters.

game.name: Streets Of Rage Z - Return Of The Hero
Street Fighter Rage World Olympic Tour
Street Fighter Ultimate Collection
game.desc: Street Fighter Ultimate Collection is considered to be one of the best fan made games in the origin series. There are over 12 character can be selectable include Namco's bonuhttps://streetfighter.fandom.com/wiki/Forum:Street_Fighter_Ultimate_Collections character is added in the bonus game. The download only available for the members since it was the 10th collectors of Ericard Production game made.

game.name: Street Fighter Vs The King of Fighters
Street Of Rage Xxx
game.desc: Streets of Rage XXX (pronounced "Triplex") is an SOR fangame originally created by Allan Cylakes and Alpha152 in 2007. It's one of the oldest Streets of Rage fangames. There are many playable characters: Axel, Adam, Blaze, Skate (aka Sammy), Max, Dr. Zan, Roo (aka Victy) and Shiva, and two guest characters: Dee Jay from the Street Fighter series and Kevin Ryan from Garou: Mark of the Wolves (here called Allan). Mr. X and the Syndicate are back (again!), and it's up to our heroes to put an end to their latest project. With 10 levels and five different story modes (Director's Cut A, B, C, D and E), Streets of Rage XXX will give you and your friends a fighting experience you'll want to come back to again and again!

game.name: Final Fight Gold Plus Lns V2.0
Super Final Fight Gold
game.desc: This game was created by Pierwolf in 2014. This opus from Final Fight Gold but becomes a cross over in this version. It can be played with 3 players, to choose among the heroes of the entire Final Fight trilogy, but also in the characters of SSF2! Each character has special moves and super moves, and can unleash aerial attacks, which thwart your opponents' combos. This game offers several routes during your game. In the final level, you will have to beat the members of Shadaloo: Balrog, Vega, Sagat and their leader Bison. The gameplay, the music, the cutscenes are really impressive. You have four modes: arcade, training, Boss mode and a Bonus mode!

game.name: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo Hd Remix
Super Thundercats - The Lost Eye Of Thundera
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Red Sky Battle
game.desc:
This game is a continuation of BonusJZ's abandoned TMNT Wrath of the Shredder. This game was developed for pc, with a special unlocker to unlock special characters. Codes can be found throughout the game. Unlock codes are:
SLASH Where is my binky?!
CASEY JONES outlaw hero
FOOT SOLDIER evil as good
There are also hidden codes for more lives & continues

game.name: Tmnt Rescue-palooza!
game.desc:
It's Pizza Time! Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Rescue-Palooza is a free fan-made beat-em-up game based on the TMNT! An update and homage to the classic NES titles, with tons of characters playable for the first time!
Vital Tortistics: - 60 playable characters - 17 stages - 4 Bonus stages - 4-player local coop - Improved graphics - Voice clips from the TV show - Rideable vehicles - Countless references to the original TMNT cartoon and toyline! ​

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Shell Shocked
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - The Wrath Of Shredder
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3 - The Manhattan Project
Vermilion Sword - The Legend Of Calibur
Warrior Frenzy
game.desc: A beat'em all game in a metal atmosphere. 4 playable characters: Knuckle, Rikki, Neff and Keem.

game.name: World Heroes - Supreme Justice Extra
game.desc: World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra is a classic side scroller arcade beat 'em up where you fight against the forces of Zeus and Neo-Dio. World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra has five playable characters + 6 secret characters to unlock plus features two player co-op. The game uses 4 buttons to punch, kick, jump and block as well as a lot of special moves, combos, and Kick/Punch combos.

game.name: X-men
game.desc: X-Men is a Beats of Rage mod created by VicViper & Kungpow, it features the Marvel superhero team which includes Iceman, Jean Grey, Psylocke and Wolverine.

game.name: X-men Guerra Dos Clones
game.desc: This game follows the story of the original, but with changes in characters because of the style of play. These characters will be selectable: nightcrawler, storm, cyclops, beast, gambit, wolverine and magneto.

game.name: X-men
game.desc: X-Men is a Beats of Rage mod created by VicViper & Kungpow, it features the Marvel superhero team which includes Iceman, Jean Grey, Psylocke and Wolverine.
